resources.string: The app measure distance using sensors through the camera!
Make sure to set the focus of the sensor while holding the phone portrait!
Tilt the phone until the focus tick good before you start measuting
After setting the focus you can click on start button, to start measuring tilt the phone little towards the measuring direction!
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
Hi %s feel free to dive in the Smart Tape settings
